nodes.text: Nigel: Hello sir, you seem a bit flustered. How can I help you?

choices.choice: I'm looking for some toilet paper
Dude, I'm going to shit myself, give me some fucking toilet paper!

nodes.text: Nigel: Certainly sir, that will be $49.99 would you like to pay with cash or credit?

choices.choice: Can't I just bill it to my room?
49.99!!! Are you out of your mind!?
Sure, just take it all. Sweet Jesus, I gotta go!

nodes.text: Nigel: Sir, I assure you I am of sound mind and that is indeed the price. Still interested?
Nigel: OH, it seems one of the vagrants has made their way into the lobby again. Security!

choices.choice: You know what, this was just a misunderstanding, I'll hold it.
Punch the security guard in the face.

nodes.text: Nigel: I apologize for the inconvenience, but that is something we only extend to our V.I.P. guests,and you sir do not appear to be on the list. Unfortunately...[whispers] (for you) [chuckles smugly to himself]

choices.choice: You son of a bitch! I'll murder you!
Ok then, about that toilet paper...

nodes.text: You angrily swing at the security guard but he dodges easily and returns the favor with a brutal punch to the gut and then throws you out the door. You're hurtin' and you realize something smells... a lot like poop. This isn't your day.
Hooray, it cost you your 401k but you've got that sweet sweet TP for your bung hole!
